name: zoder
description: Zoder is a meticulously crafted dark theme designed to enhance your coding experience in Visual Studio Code. Inspired by the Monokai Pro aesthetic, Zoder provides a visually appealing and comfortable environment with a balanced color palette that reduces eye strain and boosts productivity during long coding sessions. Featuring a sophisticated dark background with vibrant, high-contrast colors, Zoder enhances readability and focus. With comprehensive language support and enhanced syntax highlighting, Zoder ensures a consistent and pleasant coding experience across a wide range of programming languages.
